practice_phrases: You're going to buy it.
你要买它。
Are you going to buy that one?
你要买那个吗？
I heard you're going to buy something inside.
我听说你要买里面的东西。
She said you're going to buy it now.
她说你要买现在。
You're going to buy it before you move to the city.
你要在搬到城市之前买它。
I'm worrying about how you're going to buy that one.
我担心你将如何买那个。
I heard that you're going to buy something without paying first years ago.
我听说你多年前要不先付钱买东西。
If only I could trust you're going to buy it without making trouble between us.
要是我能相信你要买它不在我们中间制造麻烦就好了。
There's no point worrying about whether you're going to buy it at the entrance or inside.
担心你要在入口还是里面买它没有意义。
I hate to say this, but you're going to buy it even though you don't know how to pay.
我讨厌说这个，但你要买它即使你不知道如何付钱。
I want a new bed.
我想要一张新床。
She needs a new bed now.
她现在需要一张新床。
I heard about a new bed at the entrance.
我听说入口有一张新床。
He's looking for a new bed inside.
他在里面找一张新床。
I moved to the city to buy a new bed.
我搬到城市买一张新床。
You're going to buy a new bed before we move.
你要在我们搬家之前买一张新床。
I used to have a new bed years ago before we moved to the city.
多年前我们搬到城市之前我以前有一张新床。
I'm worrying about how you're going to find a new bed without getting lost.
我担心你将如何不迷路找一张新床。
If only I could trust you to buy a new bed without worrying about how to pay.
要是我能相信你买一张新床不担心如何付钱就好了。
I hate making trouble, but there's no point buying a new bed if you don't know how to pay.
我讨厌制造麻烦，但如果你不知道如何付钱买一张新床没有意义。
I want to buy a new bed.
我想买一张新床。
She's going to buy a new bed.
她要买一张新床。
I'm trying to buy a new bed now.
我现在试着买一张新床。
He moved to buy a new bed inside.
他搬去里面买一张新床。
I used to buy a new bed years ago.
多年前我以前买一张新床。
You're going to buy a new bed before we move.
你要在我们搬家之前买一张新床。
I'm worrying about how you're going to buy a new bed without knowing how to pay.
我担心你将如何不知道如何付钱买一张新床。
If only I could trust you to buy a new bed without making trouble at the entrance.
要是我能相信你在入口买一张新床不制造麻烦就好了。
There's no point worrying about it - I heard you're going to buy a new bed anyway.
担心它没有意义 - 我听说你反正要买一张新床。
I heard that you're going to buy a new bed.
我听说你要买一张新床。
